data.name: Failed to delete image {0}.
data.value: Fallo en la eliminación de la imagen {0}.
data.comment: Failed To Delete File Notification

data.name: The image file is in use by another process.
data.value: La imagen está en uso por otro proceso.
data.comment: Reason for a failed file operation.

data.name: The image file doesn't exist anymore!
data.value: La imagen ya no existe!
data.comment: Reason for a failed file operation.

data.name: A duplicate image name was specified!
data.value: Se ha especificado un nombre de imagen duplicado!
data.comment: Reason for a failed rename operation.

data.name: The image name contains invalid characters.
data.value: El nombre de la imagen contiene caracteres no válidos.

data.name: Please enter a different image name.
data.value: Por favor, introduzca un nombre de imagen diferente.
data.comment: Prompt to change a specified image name.

data.name: The following characters are not allowed: {0}
data.value: Los siguientes caracteres no están permitidos: {0}

data.name: Delete Image?
data.value: ¿Borrar la imagen?
data.comment: Prompt. Centered text on a thumbnail when hovering the delete button.

data.name: Rename Image
data.value: Cambiar el nombre de la imagen
data.comment: Imperative. Tooltip when hovering a thumbnail's input textbox.

data.name: Click To Zoom
data.value: Haga clic para ampliar
data.comment: Imperative. Tooltip when hovering a thumbnail.

data.name: Unable to rename image {0}.
data.value: No se puede renombrar la imagen {0}.
data.comment: Failed To Rename File Notification

data.name: Search...
data.value: Buscar...
data.comment: Placeholder text for the search thumbnails input textbox.

data.name: Favourite
data.value: Favorito
data.comment: Tooltip when hovering a thumbnail's favourite marker.

data.name: Unfavourite
data.value: Unfavourite
data.comment: Tooltip when hovering a thumbnail's unfavourite marker.

data.name: Image name cannot be empty.
data.value: El nombre de la imagen no puede estar vacío.
data.comment: Error notification when a specified rename text is empty or consists of just spaces.

data.name: Screenshot Created!
data.value: ¡Captura de pantalla creada!
data.comment: Notification header when a screenshot is created (usually using the print screen key).

data.name: Normal
data.value: Normal
data.comment: Display name of "Take a normal screenshot."

data.name: Take a stereoscopic screenshot.
data.value: Haz una capture de pantalla estereoscópica.
data.comment: Description or tooltip

data.name: Take a normal screenshot.
data.value: Haz una captura de pantalla normal.
data.comment: Description or tooltip

data.name: Stereoscopic
data.value: Estereoscópica
data.comment: Display name of "Take a stereoscopic screenshot."

data.name: Disable Screenshot Notification
data.value: Desactivar la notificación de capturas de pantalla

data.name: Screenshot
data.value: Capture de pantalla
data.comment: display name

data.name: Mute Screenshot Sound
data.value: Silenciar el sonido de la pantalla
data.comment: capture sound setting

data.name: Mutes the sound alert when a new screenshot has been captured.
data.value: Desactiva el efecto de sonido para las capturas de pantalla recién grabadas.

data.name: Disables the notification when a new screenshot has been captured.
data.value: Desactiva la notificación de las nuevas capturas de pantalla.

data.name: You are about to permanently destroy {0}.
data.value: Estás a punto de destruir {0} de forma permanente.

data.name: Are you sure?
data.value: ¿Está seguro?

data.name: Yes
data.value: Sí

data.name: Cancel
data.value: Cancelar

data.name: Delete sends to Recycle Bin
data.value: Borrar los envíos a la papelera de reciclaje

data.name: By default, screenshots are sent to the Recycle Bin so that they can be recovered if needed.\nWhen this feature is disabled, deleted screenshots are removed from the hard disk and their space is marked as overwriteable.
data.value: Por defecto, las capturas de pantalla se envían a la papelera de reciclaje para poder recuperarlas en caso de necesidad. Cuando esta función está desactivada, las capturas de pantalla borradas se eliminan del disco duro y su espacio se marca como sobrescribible.
data.comment: Fuzzy

data.name: Hide Corner Icon
data.value: Ocultar el elemento del menú
data.comment: Setting label to hide the menu entry

data.name: Disables the corner icon in the navigation menu.
data.value: Desactiva el icono del menú de navegación.
data.comment: Setting tooltip
